author: George Orwell
notes: Dystopian classic that explores themes of totalitarianism and surveillance.

title: Atomic Habits
author: James Clear
notes: Book about building good habits and breaking bad ones.

title: Educated
author: Tara Westover
notes: Memoir about a woman who leaves her survivalist family to pursue education.

title: Project Hail Mary
author: Andy Weir
notes: Currently reading - engaging story about space, science, and survival.

title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
notes: Exploration of wealth, decadence, and the American Dream in the Jazz Age.

title: The Hobbit
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
notes: Classic fantasy adventure that serves as a prelude to The Lord of the Rings.

title: The Midnight Library
author: Matt Haig
notes: Novel about a library that contains books of the protagonist's possible lives.

title: The Silent Patient
author: Alex Michaelides
notes: Psychological thriller that's been highly recommended.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
notes: A powerful exploration of racial injustice and moral growth in the American South.

title: Where the Crawdads Sing
author: Delia Owens
notes: Coming-of-age story mixed with a murder mystery set in the marshes of North Carolina.
